document_data.name: Ondal
document_data.mainbody: '''Ondal''' was a [[wizard]] who lived in the [[Heartlands]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was best known as a vintner who made very good [[wine]].{{Cite dungeon/179/Eye on the Realms: Ondal's Stand}}
document_data.History: When the [[Spellplague]] struck in [[1385 DR]], Ondal's manor was destroyed and the mage disappeared and was thought to have perished. Several wagonloads of [[Ondal's wine]] survived destruction and were recovered. These bottles contained [[wild magic]] that was released when the bottles were opened.
document_data.Personality: Most accounts depicted Ondal as a kindly [[wizard]].
